channel.title: Home on barry.acorps
channel.description: Recent content in Home on barry.acorps

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello everyone. This is the first ever blog post of the ‘barry.acorps’ website. It took me a while to set up, but I’m very proud of what I’ve done so far with Hugo.

item.title: Works
item.description: Welcome to my collection of works so far. Here you can see a list of what projects I’ve been working on. Online Riddles / Puzzle Games EXEMPLAR BY BLOOD (2022-Present) Exemplar By Blood Promotional Image Link: exemplarpuzzle.surge.sh Exemplar By Blood is an online riddle about a mysterious case of a dead person suddenly releasing an online riddle two years after his passing. You get an email from Zaarei922734, a bubbly internet stranger who can’t solve online riddles and is asking for your help to solve her late younger brother’s mysterious online riddle.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, welcome to my About Me section. I’m trying to abridge this as much as possible so I don’t overshare, so perhaps I’ll just do sections as if I’m interviewed.
